Transcription for 1013841

Tiananmen
Alleluia Women!
Blessed pact of Trinity
a noble and wrap ground-line
Love the earth and love the sky still, Love the earth and love you,
And love in the love and love, The young and the good and the few.
Love the earth and love the sky still, Love the earth and love you,
And love in the love and love, The young and the good and the few.
Love the earth and love the sky still, Love the earth and love you,
And love in the love and love, The young and the good and the few.
